name: Renamed ZOHO Dctask64
description: Detects a renamed dctask64.exe used for process injection, command execution, process creation with a signed binary by ZOHO Corporation
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(related.hash:*6834B1B94E49701D77CCB3C0895E1AFD* AND (NOT (process.executable:*\\dctask64.exe)))`
